alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Carbon; Southeastern Carbon; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 25 at 1:10PM MDT until October 27 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT THURSDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches. * WHERE...Northeastern Yellowstone, Northern Carbon, Southeastern Carbon, and Southwestern Yellowstone. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT Thursday Night. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will become slick, snow covered, and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall is expected from late tonight into the day Thursday.
info.instruction: For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Carbon; Southeastern Carbon; Southwestern Yellowstone
